content:
I had to head out early, but quick feedback I wanted to share from this week: overall very positive engagement with workgroups, lots of enthusiasm for taking resources carefully up the maturity scale.

One common theme: it sure would be nice to be able to annotate the r4 publication with notes about things that we know are going to cause confusion (e.g., mistakes we've found) -- which could be something like links from the published spec, in context, out to a Confluence page with "discovered issues and notes and FYIs".
@Lloyd McKenzie @Grahame Grieve @Ewout Kramer in case one of you has eyes here.
